        Default constructor of the PlayingMediaFile class.

        cami - Path of the file. It is a parameter of the superclass constructor.
        descripcio - Description of the file, used in a setter of the superclass.
        codec - It initializes the codec.
        durada - It initializes the duration.
        r - It initializes the player.
